fields.title: about
fields.content:
## About  
  

Hi, I'm Yan, this is my blog to which I usually post things I find useful. You can contact me by sending an email at [janusle[at]gmail.com](mailto:janusle@gmail.com).

If you want to send me something encrypted, my GPG key is [here](https://keybase.io/janusle/key.asc). Its fingerprint is:

```
25BA 79DA B73C 5BC6 F8CB 0E91 3467 26BC 23BB A9F9
```
My keybase.io account is [janusle](https://keybase.io/janusle).
